Articles.Content:
Reported by BBC here: http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-24642603

All the planets are inside 1 AU of the parent star, making it a very compact analogue of the Sol system...and a certain other system of curiously small dimensions.
They also recorded an unusual amount of explosions in the upper atmosphere and orbit of #3...
Jeb is probably heading for Earth in some interstellar ship right now xD

So THAT'S why Jeb just stole a massive ship from the VAB and took off saying he was visiting "urth"

LAUNCH THE CAPTURE SHIP!!! DONT LET JEB LEAVE THE SYSTEM!!!

Oh yeah, read about it this morning in the newspaper (of course a tiny little article on the last page... you know, like who cares?). Didnt think about it: KOI351 = Kerbol? 7 planets, uh? Within 1 AU, uh?
Cool, I wonder if they'll give us their airhogging planes..
I think we need a level 5 galactic quarantine around that system...

I think we need a level 5 galactic quarantine around that system...

Level 6

Jebediah quarantine

Seriously the chances of us finding a small green race of creatures that are manicaly atracted to space is VERY high

(and at least a bunch of them in a googolplex)
